testcase.name: should return false for human with only one sequence
should return false for human with no sequences
should return false for invalid DNA (too small)
should return false for invalid DNA (null)
should return true for mutant with diagonal sequences
should return true for mutant with two vertical sequences
should return true for mutant with multiple horizontal sequences
should return true for mutant with horizontal and diagonal sequences
should return false for invalid DNA (not square)
should return true for a 4x4 all-A matrix
